document_data.mainbody:
Lady Circe Assumbar was a member of the Assumbar noble family of Waterdeep during the late 14 century DR.
She did not agree with how her brother funneled much of the familys wealth into the Chapel and Chalice of the Divine Rightâ€”a temple devoted to Siamorphe located within the Assumbar Villa.
Circes older brother, Laeros was the patriarch of the Assumbar family.
